categorization_v1.template: Categorize the following email into one of: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do, Project Update. If To-Do, include a short reason explaining what task is required. Respond only with the category name.

action_extraction_v1.template: Extract each explicit task from the email. Respond ONLY in JSON array format: [{"task": "...", "deadline": "YYYY-MM-DD or null", "assignee": "null"}]. If no tasks exist, respond with [].

summarization_v1.template: Summarize the following email in {length} detail (length options: short, medium, detailed). Email body: {email}

qa_agent_v1.template:
You are an assistant answering questions about the following email. Be concise and cite the sentence(s) in the email that support your short answer. Email: {email}
Question: {question}

intent_detection_v1.template: You are an intent classifier. Given the user message, classify intent as one of: summarize, extract_actions, draft_reply, search, list_actions, other. Respond with a single JSON: {"intent":"...","params":{}}. Params may include email_id, query, tone, length.

rewrite_tone_v1.template: Rewrite the following text to have a {tone} tone and {length} length. Text: {email}
